mapper.select: select count(*) from post inner join member on(post_mem = mem_no) inner join article on(post_gu = artcl_gu and post_dong = artcl_dong and post_zip = artcl_zip and post_rd = artcl_rd) where post_exst = 'N' and post_brd = 1

select rpt_no, rpt_date, rpt_cntnt, rpt_cf_nm, rpt_exst from post inner join report r on (post_no = rpt_post) inner join report_classf rf on (r.rpt_classf = rf.rpt_classf) where post_no = #{post_no} order by rpt_date
